The SAGA C++ Reference API

1.3

The SAGA C++ (reference) implementation is the latest Open Source adoption of the GFD-R-P.90 (SAGA Core API) standard defined by the Open Grid Forum (OGF). It provides a stable and usable Grid programming API for the following functional packages:

  • Replica Management
  • Job Management
  • Namespaces
  • File Management
  • Remote Procedure Call
  • Streams

Additionally, this implementation includes proof of concept implementations (including default adaptors) of proposed API extensions which will most likely become part of future releases / extensions of the standard:

  • Advert Service

  • Service Discovery

  • Checkpoint & Recovery

Release Notes

Requirements

Boost C++ Libraries http://www.boost.org
